ygData.subject: *cough* Great News
ygData.msgSnippet: Tonight Steven came home since this is the mark of our 5th year together. June 10th, 2003 He handed me a box that I thought had a necklace in it. I never
ygData.messageBody:
Tonight Steven came home since this is the mark of our 5th year
together. "June 10th, 2003"

He handed me a box that I thought had a necklace in it. I never wear
a lot of jewelry. It was a bracelet with dragons he knew I loved. I
was working on a site for a member (all I need are pictures). So, I
looked said it was really nice and finished up the HTML portion of
the links page even though I keep finding more helpful links that can
help other people in our situation...

he thought I was upset and said he was going to wait but handed me a
ring. He stated it was the first part to the wedding set. (Exciting)

I am a simple person to please and it is "the thought that counts".
He asked where I wanted to go to dinner. He's thinking a fantsy
restruant... I said "Jimboys Tacos" with a smile.

._.-~*~-.Beverly R.-~*~-._.-~*~-._

P.O. Box 15192
Sacramento, CA 95813
"Before we can break free from what binds us we must first realize we
are locked up".
